synopsis.text: Yuyu's and Nana's friendship dates back to their elementary school days, with Nana always yielding to Yuyu's whims, be it coordinating outfits or identical hairstyles, even when she'd rather not. However, Nana reaches a turning point when she decides to embrace her individuality and break free from always acquiescing to Yuyu's requests. This heartfelt tale explores the intricacies of true friendship and personal growth.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
